Name: Papa Noel
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Giffard Banane du Brésil liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of cinnamon stick (& originally with a sugar rim).
Review: Cognac, aromatic dry vermouth, rich honey, lemon juice and crème de banana with a dash of Angostura.
History: Adapted from a recipe created by Vlachakis Marios at A for Athens, Athens, Greece. Vlachakis’ original recipe calls for Martell XO and Martini Ambrato vermouth.
Nutrition: One serving of Papa Noel contains 188 calories
